remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 3rd paragraph, 5th line on p. 115.  Show that t ` \/ ` v =/= p ` \/ ` q and s ` <_ ` p ` \/ ` q implies ` -. ` t ` <_ ` p ` \/ ` q.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2012.)
statement:
cdleme22.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme22.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme22.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme22.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme22.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme22b $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ ( S e. A /\ T e. A /\ S =/= T ) ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ P =/= Q ) /\ ( V e. A /\ ( ( T .\/ V ) =/= ( P .\/ Q ) /\ S .<_ ( T .\/ V ) /\ S .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) ) -> -. T .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) $.
